entry.title: SAP HCM + Workday (2nd Compensation change doesnt reflect in SAP)
entry.content:
hi,

WD sends data to SAP thru IDOC.

If compensation data is changed on SAME DAY for 2 future dates, the 2nd compensation change doesnt reflect in SAP, it show the 1st compensation change only.

Neither the IDOC provides any info or error.

Please assist.

entry.title: how to read the records for it1010 from abap method?

Is there an actual method to read the it?

Thanks!

entry.title: Before / After – SAP UI Redesign
entry.content:
When I looked at the old screen, the main issues I noticed were not only visual but structural:
•Poor hierarchy → information was presented at the same level, which made it harder for the user to know where to focus first.
•User distraction → too many elements with equal weight distracted the employee from the main task.
•Navigation challenges → actions were not clearly grouped, so the workflow felt fragmented.
•Overloaded tables → data was shown without enough spacing or prioritization, creating cognitive load.

For ERP systems like SAP, the priority is not just to make the interface “look good.” The real challenge is User Experience (UX):
•Helping users perform complex tasks efficiently.
•Reducing errors and time spent on repetitive actions.
•Making the workflow intuitive even with heavy data and multiple modules.

That’s why in this redesign, my focus was on clarity, task hierarchy, and reducing friction. The UI itself is simple, but the main value comes from a UX approach that improves how people interact with the system daily.

The next iterations will be aligned with the SAP Fiori guidelines, combining both usability and a consistent visual design.

entry.title: Provisión ISN
entry.content:
Hola buenas tardes.

Me pueden apoyar por favor. Hace unos días crean nuevas subdivisiones en mi empresa, pero hoy el departamento de nóminas me indicó que la contabilización de la nómina no está realizando la provisión del impuesto sobre nómina.

Validé en la  V_001P_ALL y todo lo veo bien, no se porque no hace el cálculo correspondiente al ISN

Ayuda.

entry.title: Pcr in retro time evaluation should return employee's personnel subarea as of today
entry.content: Hi. I am trying to create a PCR which should return Employee's current Personnel Subarea even when retro time evaluation is run. E.g. an employee transferred from PTR to FTR personel subarea on 1 Aug 2025. When I run retro time evaluation on any date e.g. 30 July 2025, this pcr should return value of employee PSA as of today I.e. FTR. Is this possible?

entry.title: sporadische Fehlermeldung "ADS: Die Adobe-Dokument-Services haben kein Ergebnis zu(0 )"
entry.content:
We print many PDFs (pay slips) via SAP HCM using HR Forms and Adobe Document Services.
The following error occurs from time to time:
“ADS: Adobe Document Services has no results for (0).” (Original message in GERMAN "ADS: Die Adobe-Dokument-Services haben kein Ergebnis zu(0 )")
The error cannot be narrowed down to a specific personnel case or company code. I cannot identify a pattern as to when or why the error message occurs.

How can I proceed to determine the cause of the problem?


----------------

Wir drucken über SAP HCM mittels HR Forms und Adobe-Dokument-Services viele PDFs (Entgeltnachweise).
Es kommt immer mal wieder zu folgendem Fehler:
"ADS: Die Adobe-Dokument-Services haben kein Ergebnis zu(0 )"
Der Fehler lässt sich nicht auf einen bestimmten Personalfall oder Buchungskreis eingrenzen. Ich kann kein Muster erkennen wann oder wieso es zu der Fehlermeldung kommt.

Wie kann ich weiter vorgehen um die Problemursache zu bestimmen?

entry.title: Leave provision expense posting from HR-FI is appearing on the credit side instead of the debit side
entry.content:
Looking for help with the accounting entry while Leave provision for the employee and leave taken by the employee.

Current accounting entry as below for monthly accumulation as well as off-cycle while taking leaves

Leave provision expenses (PL) Dr 25

Leave provision (B/S) Cr 25

When the employee takes leave (let's assume 5 days)

Leave provision (B/S) Dr 5

Employee Cr 5

But there is a posting happening in the credit side of Leave provision expense account which was raised a concern by finance team. When we checked with HCM Consultant, they said its standard. It happens when an employee takes leave and current leave balance will be less than the previous month, which leads to a negative balance for that month and a credit value to the expense account will get posted. As per expectation from our finance team, when an employee takes leave, it should get adjusted from the Leave provision(B/S) account, which is paying out the liability by the company should not adjust in the expense.

Is it required to adjust with expense account in the monthly payroll while taking leave by employee? Is it standard/normal behavious in SAP which is postig credit value to the expense account when taking leaves? Would love to hear your thoughts here—really appreciate it

entry.title: Error en el cálculo de nómina, paga extra al cargar incapacidades
entry.content:
Buenas tardes. Tengo un error en mi calculo de la nómina.
Al correrla en la PC00_M32_CALC y el colaborador tener incapacidades se le  esta pagando erróneamente.

Salario diario: 348.68
Día trabajado: 1
Factor 7mo día: 1.166667

Salario a pagar: 406.79 y no los 813.58 que indica el recibo.


Si no tiene incapacidades su calculo es correcto.

¿Saben en que parte puedo revisar esta configuración?

Gracias y saludos.

entry.content:
Hi Experts.

I am trying to shift from using Adobe forms to use FPM forms. I was able to submit the request from the Employee side but when I tried the approval screen from the Manager, I am getting the error below.

As per the link, this is the WDA used asr_process_execute_fpm- ASR_EXECUTE_3_STEP upon clicking the work items from HRMSS_AC_POWL_INBOX . this is from a custom workflow step. using standard task ID 17900101.

 

Am I may missing something?

entry.title: Which transaction code to maintain the table T77S0?
entry.content:
Hello,

Some notes are talking about maintaining the table T77S0 (with ending zero character) but don't say how.

For instance, the note 73318 - Q&A: Transport of workflow objects - SAP for Me says:

"The automatic transport connection for tasks can be switched on and off by setting the FOLDEN flag in table T77S0. (IMG path: "Tools" - "PD - Set up transport connection") : TRSP CORR X Transport flag (x = no transport)"

Which transaction code to maintain the table T77S0?

Thanks.

Sandra

entry.title: How to change Documents Status from "Indexing" to "Active" in SAP Personnel File: Organizer
entry.content:
Hello all, this is my first time here so not really sure if im asking in right page but here's my question.

I am using the SAP Personnel File: Organizer to upload documents.
I found some documents show "indexing" in documents status. And some show "Active". With an "indexing" status, I am not able to make change of the document I uploaded. 

I think I know why it will happen, it is because when I upload documents through "Document Processing", I didn't tick the "Migration" box..

However, even I tried to look into "Execute inbox tasks" in "Document Processing", I still cannot find my way out to change the status from "Indexing" to "Active". Please could anyone have solution of this? I can't even delete those indexing doc. 

Thank you very much

entry.title: Error in archiving for HRCUSTAX object
entry.content:
We have configured HRCUSTAX object for archiving of data for employees. On running preprocessing job, we get following error for some of the records.

 

80000189   0210   FED   2010-09-01   9999-12-31          No data record for key 800001890210FED    9999123120100901000 before deletion
80000189   0161   FED   2010-09-01   2016-01-01          No data record for key 800001890161FED    2016010120100901000 before deletion

 

These entries are present in PA0210 and PA0161. They are not locked as well, yet we see these messages. It is possible to manually delete the record via PA30.  

Please suggest a fix.

entry.title: PCR for PF Calculation Using Processed Basic
entry.content:
Dear Expert,

An employee has a basic wage type 1000 in Infotype 0008 with an amount of 30,000. He was on Leave Without Pay  (Action) for 10 days (11–15, 21–25) and therefore remained inactive during this period. After the factoring and storage process in the schema, the wage type 1000 amount is reduced to 20,322.58, which is working correctly.

The issue arises with the PF wage type 1101 in Infotype 0014. The PF is expected to be calculated as a percentage (e.g., 20%) of the employee’s factored basic pay. However, the system is not considering the factored basic (20,322.58) for the calculation.

Payroll Schema

Z023 - (storing the basic salary after factoring)

The factored basic salary is not being stored in BVER. I believe this is the issue, as the value cannot be read 

ZREC - ( PF calculation rule)

If I use the code mentioned below, only the amounts for Basic01 and Basic02 are read; it does not work for general employees.

AMT+E 1000 - 9,677.42
AMT+R 1000 - 5,806.45 

 

The PF should be calculated as 20% of 20,322.58 = 4,064.52, but this adjustment is currently missing.

Kindly review and suggest a solution.

@sikindar_a

I cannot recognize any pattern why is this happening, also checked if there are any custom enhancement, user exits, etc, but didnt find anything.

Thanks,

entry.title: Pay Range in Job Requisition
entry.content:
We are looking to map the Pay Range in EC to the Job Requisition fields, but we are facing a challenge due to the fact that the pay ranges have different minimum, maximum, and midpoint values. Also, this pay ranges is not maintained in position, hence we need to create a basic rule. Below is an example of the pay ranges we are working with:

Example Pay Ranges:

Pay Range ID: Pay Range 1

  • Minimum Pay 1: 43,200
  • Maximum Pay 1: 64,800
  • Mid Point 1: 54,000
  • Minimum Pay 2: 44,800
  • Maximum Pay 2: 67,200
  • Mid Point 2: 56,000
  • Minimum Pay 3: 44,800
  • Maximum Pay 3: 67,200
  • Mid Point 3: 56,000

Expected Mapping in Job Requisition:

When a recruiter selects a specific Pay Range ID in the Job Requisition, the following fields should be mapped as follows:

If Pay Range 1 is selected:

  • ABS Min: Should be equal to Minimum Pay 1 (43,200)
  • ABS Median: Should be equal to Mid Point Pay 1 (54,000)
  • ABS Max: Should be equal to Maximum Pay 1 (64,800)
  • TTC Min: Should be equal to Minimum Pay 2 (44,800)
  • TTC Median: Should be equal to Mid Point Pay 2 (56,000)
  • TTC Max: Should be equal to Maximum Pay 2 (67,200)
  • TDC Min: Should be equal to Minimum Pay 3 (44,800)
  • TDC Median: Should be equal to Mid Point Pay 3 (56,000)
  • TDC Max: Should be equal to Maximum Pay 3 (67,200)

Question:

Is it possible to implement this mapping dynamically using a rule in EC? Specifically, we want the rule to be easy to maintain and automatically update whenever the Pay Range in EC changes. This would prevent the need for manually updating the rule in the requisition each time the Pay Ranges are updated.

If this is feasible, could you please provide guidance on how to configure such a rule?

Your assistance would be greatly appreciated!

entry.title: SAP Enable Now - Troubleshooting - Cannot Record
entry.content:
Dear Team,

I have a Author in our group whom was able to record in Producer initially, but after a week the recording functionality stopped completely.

Herewith the notes and errors:

  1. Error file indicating the handshake error: -RecordingAutomat::handshake_ - HANDSHAKE FAILED - switching to out of process hook
  2. No network, proxy, or antivirus settings that has been changed, to your knowledge (can anyone from IT at Aegis confirm this for us?)
  3. Method to Uninstall all existing extensions from all the browsers that has been used and reinstall from the Manager App has been done.
  4. Only one extension is installed at a time, specifically the "SAP Enable Now, desktop application recorder."
  5. Other conflicting extensions has been uninstalled.
  6. Cache has been cleared and reboot done afterwards

 

Specs:

  • Chip: Apple M2
  • Memory: 16 GB
  • macOS: Version 15.6.1 Sequoia

 

The Author is running Windows using parallels:

  • Parallels version: 26.1.1
  • Windows version: 11 Pro, 24H2 
  • OS Build: 26100.6584
  • Memory used: 6 GB

 

It might be changed after an update of the Windows version. But the Author removed windows completely and installed it again, but this didn’t solve this issue. I reiterate that he was able at first, but cannot record any longer.
Any information would be helpful!
